Translations.Text: ‘asambhara, tomalokaka yi bisaye pratisrauti diya haiche seya asambhara
‘Ekamatra parthira jirane'i amara jirana, amara jirana marana iyate'i; arau ami ketiya'o punaraut'thita naha'om
‘E'om enekuraa ejana byakti yiye allaha samparke micha apabada diche, ami te'omka ketiya'o bisbasa nakarao’
Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Moka sahaya karaa, karana sihamte moka michaliya buli asbikara karaiche’
Allahe ka’le, ‘kichu samayara majate'i sihamta niscitaraupe anutapta ha’ba’
Tara pichata eta bikata sabda'i satya-n'yayara saite sihamtaka akraanta karaile, phalata ami sihamtaka batahe urauraa'i niya ararjanara darae karai dilo. Eteke yalima sampradayara babe kerala dhbansa
Iyara pichata ami arau bahu prajanma srsti karaicho
Kono jatiye'i sihamtara nirdista samayaka agatiyakai aniba noraarae arau pichalaiyo theli diba noraarae

Iyara pichata ami ejanara pichata ejanakai amara raachulasakalaka praerana karaicho. Yetiya'i kono jatira ocarata sihamtara raachula ahiche tetiya'i sihamte te'omka asbikara karaiche. Phalata ami sihamtaka etara pichata etakai dhbansa karai kahinita parainata karaicho. Eteke yisakale imana posana nakarae se'ibora sampradayara babe kerala dhbansa'i dhbansa
tara pichata ami mucha arau te'omra bhatr haraunaka amara nidarsanaralisaha lagate suspasta pramanasaha praerana karailo
phira'a'una arau te'omra paraisadabargara ocarata. Kintu sihamte ahankara karaile; arau sihamta achila ud'dhata sampradaya
Tara pichata sihamte ka’le, ‘ami amara darae'i dujana byaktira prati imana posana karaimane, athaca te'omlokara jatira manuhabilaka amara dasa’
eteke sihamte te'omloka ubhayake asbikara karaile, phalata sihamta dhbansapraapta sakalara antarbhukta ha’la
Arau ami arasye muchaka kitaba pradana karaichilo; yate sihamte hidayata paba parae
Ami mara'iyamara putra arau te'omra matrka eta nidarsana bana'ichilo arau te'omlokaka asraya dichilo eta arasthanayogya arau prasraranabisista ucca bhumita
‘He raachulasakala! Tomaloke paraitra bastura paraa khadya grahana karaa arau satkarma karaa; niscaya tomaloke yi karaa se'i samparke ami sabisesa aragata
‘Arau tomalokara e'i um'mata kerala eta'i um'mata, arau maye'i tomalokara raba; eteke kerala morae'i takbaraa aralambana karaa’
Pichatahe manuhe sihamtara nijara majata sihamtara e'i dbinaka bahudha bibhakta karaiche. Pratyeka dale'i sihamtara ocarata yi ache se'ito laihe anandita
Eteke kichu samayara babe sihamtaka sihamtara bibhraantite erai diya
Sihamte bharae neki ye, ami sihamtaka yi dhana-sampada arau santana-santatira dbaraa sahayogita karaicho, tara madhyamata
ami sihamtara babe sakalo mangala taraanbita karaima? Nahaya, baram sihamte upalabdhi karaiba paraa na'i
Niscaya yisakale nija pratipalakara bhayata bhita-santrasta
Arau yisakale nija pratipalakara nidarsanasamuhara prati bisbasa posana karae
arau yisakale nija pratipalakara lagata sbirka nakarae
arau yisakale dana karaibalagiya bastu bhita-kampita hrdayata dana karae, e'i karane ye, te'omloke nija pratipalakara ocarata pratyarartanakarai
Te'omloke'i kalyana sadhanata kharadhara karae arau te'omloka tata agragami haya
Arau ami kako tara sadhyatita dayitbara boja arpana nakarao arau amara ocarata ache ene ekhana kitapa yito satya byakta karae arau sihamtara prati akano an'yaya karaa naha’ba
Baram e'i bisaye sihamtara antara ajnanatata acchanna, iyara bahirae'o sihamtara arau karma ache yibora sihamte karai ache
Arasesata yetiya ami sihamtara bilasi byaktisakalaka sasti di'om tetiya sihamte artanada karai uthe
Sihamtaka koraa ha’ba, ‘aji artanada nakaraiba, niscaya tomaloke amara phalara paraa kono sahaya napaba’
Arasye mora ayatasamuha tomalokara ocarata tilarata karaa haichila, kintu tomaloke ulati pichaphalehe guci gaichila
dambhikatarae e'i bisayata arthahina galpa-gujaba karai tomaloke raati atibahita karaichila
Kiya sihamte e'i bani samparke cinta-garaesana nakarae? E'i karane neki ye, sihamtara ocarata enekuraa bastu ahiche yito sihamtara purbapurausasakalara ocarata aha nachila
athaba sihamte nija raachulaka ciniba paraa na'i buli asbikara karaiche neki
na'iba sihamte e'ito kaya neki ye, e'om unmadanagrasta? Nahaya, baram te'om sihamtara ocarata satya lai ahiche, arau sihamtara adhikansa'i satyaka apachanda karae

Arau satya yadi sihamtara kamana-basanara anugami ha’lehemtena tente akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata thaka sakalo bastu bisrnkhala hai parailehemtena. Baram ami sihamtara ocarata lai ahicho sihamtara sanmana sambalita yikara (kora'ana) kintu sihamte sihamtara e'i upadesabanira (kora'anara) paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya
Athaba tumi sihamtara ocarata kono pratidana bicaraa neki? (Jani thoraa) tomara pratipalakara pratidane'i sraestha arau teraemi sraestha jiraikadata
Arau niscaya tumi sihamtaka sarala pathara pine'i ahbana karai acha
Niscaya yisakale akhiraatara prati imana posana nakarae, sihamte'i sarala pathara paraa bicyuta
